comments.text: Unfortunately I don't think there is the resource to get this into 2.1, but if someone can then I'm sure we'd look at taking it.
comments.creator: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Unfortunately I don't think there is the resource to get this into 2.1, but if someone can then I'm sure we'd look at taking it.

comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:6.0a1) Gecko/20110417 Firefox/6.0a1 SeaMonkey/2.2a1pre ID:20110417003006

WORKAROUND: To move any tab to the far right: open it again in a new tab (by right-clicking the appropriate line of the folders or threads pane, then "Open in New Tab") then close the original tab (right-click the tab, then "Close Tab").

By doing this repeatedly you can get the mail tabs in any order. But if you have many tabs it may need some work.
comments.creator: antoine.mechelynck@gmail.com
